meanings: (영화·소설 등의) villain, (Am) bad guy, (Brit, inf) baddy; (깡패) hoodlum, (literary) miscreant

vlive.korean: 악당들이다! The bad guys! 듣기 View video 강다니엘 (KANG DANIEL) : 강다니엘(KANGDANIEL) - TOUCHIN' M/V Making Film Part.2
"당신은 범죄자입니다 내 마음을 악당..." "You're a criminal to steal my heart". 듣기 View video iKON : 송&동
vlive.english: "You're a criminal to steal my heart".

vlive.korean: [상대역을 기다리다 악당을 만나면?] [When you meet a bad guy while waiting for your counterpart?] View video 강다니엘 (KANG DANIEL) : 강다니엘(KANGDANIEL) - TOUCHIN' M/V Making Film Part.2
vlive.english: [When you meet a bad guy while waiting for your counterpart?]

vlive.korean: 네 맞습니다 - 진혁 씨가 생각하는 뭐 악당의 이미지는 어떤 건가요? Right. - What's the image of a villain, then? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#405. 아기태양신 (스페셜 DJ 위너 강승윤 with 이진혁)
vlive.english: Right. - What's the image of a villain, then?

vlive.korean: 악당이다! He's a villain! 듣기 View video BTS : BTS 꿀FM 06.13 : Comeback Special

examples.korean: He often plays the part of the villain. 발음듣기 그는 자주 악당 역할[악역]을 연기한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He often plays the part of the villain. 발음

examples.korean: He’s a bit of a rogue, but very charming. 발음듣기 그는 좀 악당 같은 데가 있지만 아주 매력적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s a bit of a rogue, but very charming. 발음

examples.korean: In the first act, the villain insinuates himself into the household of the man he intends to kill. 발음듣기 맨 첫 행동으로, 악당은 자기가 살해하려는 남자의 집안사람들의 환심을 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the first act, the villain insinuates himself into the household of the man he intends to kill. 발음

examples.korean: My first part was Captain O’Hagarty, a dastardly villain in a children’s play. 발음듣기 내가 맨 처음 맡은 역할은 아동극에 나오는 악랄한 악당인 오하가티 선장이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My first part was Captain O’Hagarty, a dastardly villain in a children’s play. 발음

examples.korean: What has that rascal been telling you guys? 발음듣기 저 악당이 너희에게 말했던 게 뭐니? 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: What has that rascal been telling you guys? 발음
